itemDisplayName: Cohesive Networks VNS3 6 in 1 Network Security Appliance
summary: Complete demo environment including 1 controller and upto 5 linux clients on an encrypted overlay network
description: This deployment creates a VNS3 Controller and 1 client VM configured and connected to the encrypted overlay network, To deploy this template to Azure Government, go to the Quickstart repository via the Browse on GitHub button.
